content: Pasi Raumonen | Tampere universitiesPasi RaumonenProfessor, sovellettu matematiikkaFaculty of Information Technology and Communication Sciences | Computing SciencesTampere Universitypasi.raumonen [at] tuni.fi (pasi[dot]raumonen[at]tuni[dot]fi)phone number+358503378719Hervanta CampusOrcidhttps://orcid.org/0000-0001-5471-0970About meI am a Professor of applied mathematics and I have a background in electrical engineering. My current research concentrates on 3D structure modelling of trees and forests from laser scanner data, uncertainty quantification of such modelling, and their applications in forest and ecological research. I am also one of the Principal Investigators in Academy of Finland’s Centre of Excellence in Modelling and Imaging 2018-2025 and FAME – Flagship of Advanced Mathematics for Sensing, Imaging and Modelling (2024-).Research topicsApplied mathematics, inverse problems, surface and object reconstruction, uncertainty quantification, tree and forest modelling, remote sensing (Lidar, point clouds) Selected publicationsMontagnoli A, Hudak A T, Raumonen P, Lasserre B, Terzaghi M, Silva C A, Bright B C, Vierling L A , de Vasconcellos B N, Chiatante D, Dumroese R K. 2024.
